name: The ​Aquarium Does Not Dance
storyline:
Suze is going to the aquarium with her childhood friend Lulu.
But suddenly Lulu goes missing...
Suze follows Lulu and wanders into the Aquarium of Fear.
Then, a mysterious person calling himself "Retro" suddenly attacked him.
Chris," the wife of the aquarium director, who helps Suzu to escape.
Kitty," a girl who has been trapped in the aquarium for a long time.
There is only one clue to escape...
Become a creature of the aquarium
And solve their "secrets"...
Who is the traitor?
summary:
The ​Aquarium Does Not Dance is a Japanese free horror game. The first part was developed in 2021, and the complete version including the second part was released in 2024.

This is a horror adventure game in which a girl who cares for her best friend searches for her friend in an aquarium that has turned into a world of horror. While escaping from the deformed beings called " CREEPY," the player must solve the mysteries hidden in the aquarium.

The horror elements are mild, so players can enjoy solving the challenging riddles. In addition to the main character, the game features unique and attractive girls. The story is multi-ended, and the ending changes depending on your choices.
